member.name: T:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32
member.summary: Represents 32 discrete boolean values in four octets.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.MaxIndex
member.summary: Holds the maximum allowed value that can be used when indexing a PackedBool32.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.MinIndex
member.summary: Holds the minimum allowed value that can be used when indexing a PackedBool32.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PackedBool32 struct.
member.param: The initial state of the bits in the new instance.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.#ctor(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PackedBool32 struct.
member.param: The values to initialize the new instance with.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PackedBool32 struct.
member.param: The initial state of the bits in the new instance.
The values to initialize the new instance with.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the current PackedBool32 instance to an object and determines if they are equal.
member.returns: True if obj is a PackedBool32 and has a value equal to the current instance; otherwise false.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.Equals(SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32)
member.summary: Compares the current PackedBool32 instance to another instance and determines if they have equal values.
member.returns: True if value of pbool equal to value of current instance.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.Equals(SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32,SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32)
member.summary: Compares two PackedBool32 instances and determines if they have equal values.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Exposes an enumerator which allows iteration over the discrete boolean values stored in the current PackedBool32.
member.returns: An enumerator for the current instance.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.GetHashCode
member.summary: Computes a hashcode that is mathematically related to the value of the current PackedBool32.
member.returns: The hashcode of the current instance.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.ToString
member.summary: Converts the current PackedBool32 to a string representation.
member.returns: The string representation of the current instance.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.op_Inequality(SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32,SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32)
member.summary: Compares two PackedBool32 instances and determines if they have inequal values.
member.returns: True if the two instances have inequal values, otherwise false.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.op_Equality(SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32,SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32)
member.summary: Compares two PackedBool32 instances and determines if they have equal values.
member.returns: True if the two instances have equal values, otherwise false.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.op_Explicit(SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32)~SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool
member.summary: Allows a PackedBool32 to be explicitly downconverted to a PackedBool. This is a potentially lossy operation.
member.returns: A PackedBool with a similar value to the supplied PackedBool32.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.op_Explicit(SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32)~SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool16
member.summary: Allows a PackedBool32 to be explicitly downconverted to a PackedBool16. This is a potentially lossy operation.
member.returns: A PackedBool16 with a similar value to the supplied PackedBool32

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.op_Implicit(SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32)~SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool64
member.summary: Allows a PackedBool32 to be implicitly upconverted to a PackedBool64.
member.returns: A PackedBool64 with the same value as the supplied PackedBool32.

member.name: P:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets a discrete boolean value stored in the current PackedBool32.
member.param: The index of the boolean value to access.
member.returns: The boolean value stored at index.

member.name: P:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool32.PackedValue
member.summary: Gets the actual packed value.

member.name: T:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature
member.summary: Represents a temperature in several different scales, and provides methods to convert and manipulate temperatures, as well as common standard temperatures.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.CelsiusSign
member.summary: Holds the sign used to denote a Celsius temperature represented as a string.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.DefaultUnit
member.summary: Holds the default TemperatureUnit. Temperature values provided without a unit are treated as the DefaultUnit.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.FahrenheitSign
member.summary: Holds the sign used to denote a Fahrenheit temperature represented as a string.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.KelvinSign
member.summary: Holds the sign used to denote a kelvin temperature represented as a string.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.MinimumCelsius
member.summary: Holds the minimum allowed value that can be used when specifying a value in Celsius. This is equivalent to Absolute Zero on the Celsius scale.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.MinimumFahrenheit
member.summary: Holds the minimum allowed value that can be used when specifying a value in Fahrenheit. This is equivalent to Absolute Zero on the Fahrenheit scale.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.MinimumKelvin
member.summary: Holds the minimum allowed value that can be used when specifying a value in Kelvin. This is equivalent to Absolute Zero on the Kelvin scale.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.#ctor(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Temperature class using the provided temperature value and the default temperature unit.
member.param: The value of the new Temperature.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.#ctor(System.Decimal,SerenityProject.Common.Science.TemperatureUnit)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Temperature class using the provided temperature value and the provided temperature unit.
member.param: The value of the new Temperature.
The unit of the provided value.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.AbsoluteZero
member.summary: Gets a Temperature representing the coldest possible temperature (e.g. a complete lack of thermal activity).

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.RoomTemperature
member.summary: Gets a Temperature representing the most common room temperature.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.WaterBoilingPoint
member.summary: Gets a Temperature representing the boiling point of water at standard atmospheric pressure.

member.name: F:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.WaterFreezingPoint
member.summary: Gets a Temperature representing the freezing point of water at standard atmospheric pressure.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.CompareTo(SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature)
member.summary: Compares the current Serenity.Physics.Temperature to another Serenity.Physics.Temperature.
member.param: The Serenity.Physics.Temperature object to compare to.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.Science.Temperature.Convert(System.Decimal,SerenityProject.Common.Science.TemperatureUnit,SerenityProject.Common.Science.TemperatureUnit)
member.summary: Converts a temperature value from one unit to another.
member.param: The to treat the input value as.
The to convert the input value to.
member.returns: The converted temperature value.

member.summary: Determines whether the specified is equal to the current
member.param: The to compare with the current .

member.summary: Determines if the current is equal to the specified .

member.summary: Determines if two instances are equal.

member.summary: Converts a Temperature to it's string represention, using the default TemperatureUnit.

member.summary: Determines if two Serenity.Physics.Temperature objects are equal.

member.summary: Disposes (releases unmanaged resources) the current object.

member.summary: Writes the supplied T object to a stream.

The object to write to the stream.
member.remarks: The supplied Stream must support writing.

The object to write to an array of bytes.
member.returns: True if the write operation suceeded, otherwise false.

member.summary: Allows deriving classes to implement construction unheeded.

member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, reads and returns a T from the supplied Stream.
member.param: The stream to read the T from.
When this method returns, target will contain the T object read from source.
member.returns: true if the read operation suceeded, otherwise false.
member.remarks: The supplied Stream must support reading.

member.returns: true if the read operation suceeded, otherwise false.

member.summary: Represents 16 discrete boolean values in two octets.

member.summary: Holds the maximum allowed value that can be used when indexing a PackedBool16.

member.summary: Holds the minimum allowed value that can be used when indexing a PackedBool16.

member.summary: Compares the current PackedBool16 instance to an object and determines if they are equal.

member.summary: Compares the current PackedBool16 instance to another instance and determines if they have equal values.
member.returns: True if value of pbool equal to value of current instance.

member.summary: Compares two PackedBool16 instances and determines if they have equal values.

member.summary: Exposes an enumerator which allows iteration over the discrete boolean values stored in the current PackedBool16.

member.name: M:SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool16.op_Equality(SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool16,SerenityProject.Common.PackedBool16)
member.summary: Compares two PackedBool instances and determines if they have equal values.
member.returns: True if the two instances have equal values, otherwise false.

member.summary: Allows a PackedBool16 to be explicitly downconverted to a PackedBool. This is a potentially lossy operation.
member.returns: A PackedBool with a similar value to the supplied PackedBool16.

member.summary: Determines if a specific char is a valid hexadecimal character.
